edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.metric
Class Quantification

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.metric.Quantification
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Quantification
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents the result of quantifying an image. Collects information (in the form of Measurement objects) about each region of interest or object in the image into one place.

Author:
Colin J. Fuller
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

addMeasurement

public void addMeasurement(Measurement m)
Adds a measurement to the Quantification.

Parameters:
m - The measurement to add.

addAllMeasurements

public void addAllMeasurements(Quantification q)
Adds all the measurements present in another quantification.

Parameters:
q - The Quantification whose measurements will be added.

getAllMeasurements

public java.util.List<Measurement> getAllMeasurements()
Get all the measurements comprising the Quantification.

Returns:
a List of Measurements in the Quantification.

getAllMeasurementsForName

public java.util.List<Measurement> getAllMeasurementsForName(java.lang.String name)
Gets all the measurements whose name matches the provided name.

Parameters:
name - A String containing the name of the measurements. This must be exactly the name used to create the measurement.
Returns:
A List containing the measurements matching the given name; if there are no matches, an empty list is returned.

getAllMeasurementsForRegion

public java.util.List<Measurement> getAllMeasurementsForRegion(long regionID)
Gets all the measurements whose name matches the provided region ID.

Parameters:
regionID - A long designating the region ID.
Returns:
A List containing the measurements matching the given ID; if there are no matches, an empty list is returned.

getAllRegions

public java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> getAllRegions()
Gets the region IDs of all the regions that have associated measurements in the Quantification.

Returns:
A Set containing the region IDs.

getAllMeasurementsForType

public java.util.List<Measurement> getAllMeasurementsForType(java.lang.String type)
Gets all the measurements in the Quantification matching the specified type. The type should likely be one of those listed in the constants in Measurement but can be any String.

Parameters:
type - A String specifying the type of the measurements to return.
Returns:
A List containing the measurements matching the given type; if there are no matches, an empty list is returned.

getAllGlobalMeasurements

public java.util.List<Measurement> getAllGlobalMeasurements()
Gets all the global measurements in the Quantification. (That is, the measurements without an associated region.)

Returns:
A List containing all the global measurements, or an empty list if there are none.
